entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 2:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 3.2°C
Wind: N 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind light except north 50 km/h gusting to 70 over southern sections. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind light except north 30 km/h gusting to 50 over southern sections early this evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
